subclass.name: Magical Moon
subclassFeatures: Magical Gift: Scepter of Lunia|Sorcerer||Magic Moon|MagicMoonSorcerer|14

subclassFeature.name: Celestial Protector
entries: Your innate magic is granted to you through direct lineage with a great warrior from Mount Celestia. Some Celestial Protectors even claim to be actual reincarnations of such warriors, and tales of these guardians date back through the ages. These powers don't show themselves until the 14th birthday, upon which the new Protector is granted their magics from a talking animal guide, often bestowing the child with their first of many magical gifts. These animals immediately become companions to the new guardians, and devote themselves to a lifetime of service.

subclassFeature.name: Animal Guide
entries: Starting at 1st level, when you choose the Celestial Protector origin, you are given the {@spell Find Familiar|phb} spell. This spell does not count against your spells known. You can ritual cast this spell without material components, and the Familiar can speak and read all languages that you can. The form of your familiar cannot be changed, but its form can be one outside of the normal familiar list, but the form is ultimately decided by the DM.

subclassFeature.name: Magical Gifts
entries: Also at 1st level, you are given your first Magical Gifts. The fundamental gift is a magical brooch. This brooch can look however you wish and it represents your connection to Mount Celestia and Lunia; it is also your spellcasting focus. You will receive two more Magical Gifts; one each at 6th and 14th level.

subclassFeature.name: Wield Weapon
entries: At 1st level, you gain proficiency with light armor, medium armor, simple weapons, martial weapons, and {@item smith's tools|phb}.

subclassFeature.name: Wield Weapon
entries: At 1st level, you gain proficiency with light armor, medium armor, simple weapons, martial weapons, and {@item smith's tools|phb}.

subclassFeature.name: Reinforce Weapon
entries: Starting at 6th level, the image of weaponry isn't enough, you surpass that mere image to create a masterpiece. As part of a long rest, you can improve a simple or martial melee weapon. The weapon becomes magical if it isn't already, and gains one of the following features.

entries.name: Black Iron
entries: The weapon deals an extra {@dice 1d6} damage of the weapon's type to any target it hits. A creature can only benefit from this feature once per turn.

entries.name: White Iron
entries: The weapon gains the thrown property with a range of 20/60 feet. After a creature makes a ranged weapon attack with the weapon, it returns to the creature's hand.

A weapon can have only one of these features at a time, and if you improve a number of weapons higher than your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1), a weapon you improved of your choice loses the benefit of this feature.

subclassFeature.name: Master Weapon
entries: Starting at 14th level, you surpass yourself to master your weapon. You learn the {@spell tenser's transformation|xge} spell, which doesn't count against your number of sorcerer spells known.
Additionally, you ignore all class, race, and level requirements on the use of magic weapons.

subclassFeature.name: Endless Creation
entries: Starting at 18th level, your weaponry can surpass the world. When you use your Project Weapon, you can cause a number of simple or martial melee weapons up to your sorcerer level to rain down instead. The weapons are magical and can't become permanent.
Once you use this feature, you must finish a long rest before you can use it again.

spell.name: Radiant Tiara
entries: You remove the Magical Tiara from your head and send it out rapidly toward your enemies as it glows like bright silvery moonlight. Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} radiant damage. The tiara teleports back atop your head at the end of the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At higher levels, the spell can richochet toward another target that you can see within 30ft of the most recent target that was also hit. Make another spell attack for each richochet. You cannot make another spell attack if you miss an attack. At 5th level, it can richochet one time. At 11th level it can richochet twice. At 17th level, it can richochet three times. In addition to this, the spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} at 5th level, {@dice 2d8} at 11th level, and {@dice 3d8} at 17th level.

spell.name: Burning Bow
entries: You conjure a radiant longbow made of pure Celestian magic. Until the spell ends, you have equipped a longbow with a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with which you are proficient with a range of 150 ft. When you use this bow, you may choose to use your Charisma modifier for attacks and damage. On hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} fire or radiant damage, your choice. The weapon creates its own ammunition upon pulling back the string. If this bow leaves your person, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bonus increases to +2. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

spell.name: Celestial Blast
entries: You create a ray of radiant energy and fire it at a target within range. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 1st. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray

spell.name: Chain of Hearts

components.m: a small piece of silver chain

entries: You point your finger at a target within range. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} force damage and be {@condition restrained} for the duration as magical chains shaped like silver hearts ensare the target.
At the beginning of your turn, you can choose to use your action to continue the spell on the affected target, maintaining the {@condition restrained} condition and doing further damage.
The target can choose to re-roll the save at the end of its turn. The spell ends if you use your action to do anything else.
The spell also ends if the target is ever outside the spell's range, if it has total cover from you, or if the chain would be severed somehow, like being fully engulfed in a Resiliant
Sphere, or having a Wall of Stone placed in between you and the target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Earth Rend
entries: You Raise your hands above your head and then quickly push them out in front of you, causing a ball of energy to rush forward on the ground in a line in front of you 30 ft long, 5 ft high, and 10 ft wide. Every creature within the area of effect must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 10d6} bludgeoning damage. In addition to the damage, all creatures that fail the save will be pushed to the nearest space outside of the spell's effect and made to fall {@condition prone}.
Any creature that successfully saves against the spell takes half damage, is not pushed, and does not go {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Flash Freeze
entries: You point toward a creature within range, and they must make a Constitution saving throw, or take {@damage 4d8} cold damage and become frozen within a thin layer of celestial ice for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not frozen. During this time, the creature is {@condition paralyzed}, blind, {@condition deafened}, and cannot breathe. Taking damage shatter the ice and ends the spell. The affected target must make another Constitution save at the end of its turn. On every additional failed save, the target takes another {@dice 2d8} of cold damage.

spell.name: Mandala of Embers

components.m: a charred piece of wood from an extinguished camp fire

entries: You call upon the celestial fires that burn in the Eternal Braziers of Monut Celestia and conjure a crown of nine burning embers that slowly circle above your head for the duration of the spell. During this time, you shed bright light in a 15ft radius and dim light for an additional 15ft. As a bonus action, you can send up to four of the embers toward a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack for each ember. On a hit, the embers deal {@damage 2d4} fire damage. If you take melee damage from a creature while concentrating on this spell, before rolling a concentration check, you can choose to expend all remaining embers as a reaction, automatically dealing {@damage 1d4} damage per ember remaining. Losing concentration on this spell does not cause this effect

spell.name: Silverblade

components.m: the hilt of a broken sword

entries: You conjure a {@item silvered shortsword|PHB} made of pure Celestian magic. Until the spell ends, you have equipped a short sword with a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls and the silvered property with which you are proficient. When you use this sword, you may choose to use your Charisma modifier for attacks and damage. On hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} slashing damage. If this sword leaves your person, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bonus increases to +2. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

spell.name: Sonic Cry
entries: You channel your anger, fear, and anxiety until you can no longer hold it in, releasing it all at once in an emotional outburst of tears and wailing. Your high-pitched cries exude waves of magical damage. All creatures within a 15 ft radius must make a constitution saving throw. On a fail, a creature takes {@damage 2d8} thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} until the end of their next turn. On a success, a creature takes half damage and is not {@condition deafened}.
entriesHigherLevel: At Higher Levels When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Sugarheart
entries: A burst of heart-shaped energy repeatedly bludgeons a target within range. On hit, the target takes 1 force damage and becomes hostile toward you. A creature {@condition prone} to violence may attack you. Another creature might seek retribution in other ways.

spell.name: Thunder Dragon

components.m: a small wooden effigy of a dragon

entries: You close your eyes and extend your arms, calling upon the powers of Celestial Thunderstorms and chenneling them into the horrifying visage of a dragon made of electricity all around you. Every beat of the wings sounds like the crack of thunder.

All creatures of your choice within range must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 9d6} thunder damage and become {@condition frightened}, or half as much damage on a successful save, and resist the {@condition frightened} condition. Any creature that successfully saves is immune to the {@condition frightened} condition from this spell for 24 hours.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Zephyr of Petals

components.m: a fallen leaf from a tree

entries: You summon a whirlwind of leaves that whip around you at high speeds. All creatures that enter the whirlwind on their turn, or that begin their turn within it, must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} slashing damage, half as much on a save. In addition to this, you are heavily obscured by whipping leaves, gaining half cover.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Magical Armor
entries: You say the Magic Words, and perform the Celestial

Movements to cast Magical Armor on yourself. Upon casting, all the clothing you're wearing transforms into your magical uniform and grants you your Magical Tiara, which is necessary to cast the Radiant Tiara cantrip. Your AC becomes 13 + your Dexterity modifier. While in this form, you become unrecognizable to every other creature, regardless of how well they know you, although your appearance barely changes. Only those that witness the actual transformation will be able to discern your secret identity. In addition to these features, you also gain temporary hit points equal to your Sorcerer level. The spell ends if you don armor, or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a slot of 3rd level, your AC becomes 14 + your Dexterity modifier.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level, your AC becomes 15 + your Dexterity modifier.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level, your AC becomes 16 + your Dexterity modifier
